title: There is no Elo hell
body:
Elo Hell=Exuse that delusional players use because they can't accpet that they are'nt as good as they think they are.

If you don't belong at a certain Elo you will eventualy carry out. The odds are in your favor, you + 4 randoms vs 5 randoms.

If you don't win more than you lose at your current Elo then you are where you belong until you improve.

The lower the Elo, the worse the players, the easier it is to win

You're the constant variable and something you're doing is causing losses. Evaluate your play and see if you can find out what it is so you can correct it.
